page.title: 05RECREATION IN GEDDINGTON
page.content: Geddington has about 20 clubs and organisations for recreation. This is a large number for such a small village and even so, many adults spend at least 3 hours each day watching television. Most teenagers would like the Youth Club in Grafton Road to be improved and many find travelling to Kettering for sporting facilities very expensive and inconvenient. Swimming is a popular pastime; many residents would like Geddington to have its own pool even though this would not be commercially viable. Out of the hundred people interviewed more people went to the theatre than the cinema in the past year but the majority had visited neither. Most residents in Geddington are satisfied with the facilities for recreation.
